transformations.headline: Enterprise Security. 20+ Years.
transformations.aboutIntro: Senior Sales Engineer. SentinelOne. 20+ years enterprise security. DOW 30 conversions. $50M revenue managed.
transformations.experience: 20+ years. Enterprise security architecture. Sales engineering. 3 DOW 30 conversions. $50M annual revenue. 500,000+ endpoints.
transformations.education: BBA, Computer Information Systems. Georgia State University.
transformations.previousRole: SR Enterprise Sales Engineer. McAfee. 16 years. April 2005-November 2021.
transformations.approach: Clear. Direct. Effective. Technical discovery. POC execution. Results.

contentPrinciples: Sentence length: 5-10 words. Clear hierarchy. No clutter.
Word choice: Essential, core, fundamental, clear, straightforward
Tone: Professional minimalism, confidence through restraint
Pacing: Unhurried, spacious, room to breathe

exampleContent.serviceDescription: Enterprise security architecture. EDR. XDR. SIEM. 100,000+ endpoints. Cloud infrastructure. AWS. Azure. GCP. Kubernetes.
exampleContent.achievementStatement: 3 DOW 30 conversions. $50M managed. 500,000+ endpoints. Conference speaker. Technical documentation.
exampleContent.skillsIntro: 20+ years enterprise security. EDR. XDR. SIEM. Cloud: AWS, Azure, GCP. Infrastructure: Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform. AI: 1,000+ hours development.

avoidPatterns: Verbose explanations: 'Let me tell you about my comprehensive approach...'
